name: Kassadin
title: the Void Walker
shortBio: Cutting a burning swath through the darkest places of the world, Kassadin knows his days are numbered. A widely traveled Shuriman guide and adventurer, he had chosen to raise a family among the peaceful southern tribes—until the day his village was consumed by the Void. He vowed vengeance, combining a number of arcane artifacts and forbidden technologies for the struggle ahead. Finally, Kassadin set out for the wastelands of Icathia, ready to face any monstrous Void-construct in his search for their self-proclaimed prophet, Malzahar.

skins.name: Festival Kassadin
skins.description: Reigning from his frozen throne on a lonely mountain, Kassadin prepares in secret for a special festival hidden deep in the icy wastes. Whether it's a winter sports festival, none can say… except for the attendees, who think he's being ridiculous.

skins.name: Deep One Kassadin
skins.description: “Kassadin vanished at sea over fifty years ago. Whatever you saw down there—if you did see anything—it can't have been the same man I watched fall into the drink. And if it was… gods help us.”

skins.name: Harbinger Kassadin
skins.description: Kassadin swore vengeance on all gods, good and evil, of his world and of others, when his kingdom was destroyed by an errant thought. Forging armor from the remnants of an ancient living machine, he now sees himself growing closer towards the all-powerful beings he wishes to destroy.

skins.name: Cosmic Reaver Kassadin
skins.description: Born before the kindling of the stars, Kassadin stands alone in space's vast void. He watches over all things, a sentinel awaiting the end of this universe… and the beginning of the next.

skins.name: Count Kassadin

chromas.name: Count Kassadin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: A grim, lonely man who lives on a grim, lonely street, Kassadin is the one whom all kids avoid on All Hallows' Eve; for in his presence, there are no treats nor sweets to be found.

skins.name: Hextech Kassadin
skins.description: Engrossed in his work to the point of near-obsession, Kassadin vanished for some time into the bowels of his labyrinthian workshop, disappearing from public life for years. When he emerged, he revealed a shocking hextech innovation to the world: his own body, fully integrated with the technology he so loved.

skins.name: Shockblade Kassadin

chromas.name: Shockblade Kassadin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: As high priest of the Shockblade order, Kassadin has a deep connection to the Storm few understand, but all respect. It is the power of his station that allows the Shockblades to follow their targets in and out of the spirit realm, going where no one else can to protect the people under their charge.

skins.name: Dragonmancer Kassadin

chromas.name: Dragonmancer Kassadin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Kassadin scoured the world in search of a missing loved one. He mapped out a path in the stars, following a pattern of constellations only he could read—reaching an open field where the Astral Dragon recognized his purpose. Though his spirit darkens over the possibility his journey may never end, he now harnesses the dragon's brilliance to light his way.

passive.name: Void Stone
passive.description: Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

spells.name: Null Sphere
spells.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
spells.dynamicDescription: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> and interrupting channels. Kassadin also gains <shield>@TotalShield@ Magic Shield</shield> for 1.5 seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Nether Blade
spells.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Kassadin's Attacks deal an additional @OnHitDamage@ magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his blade, causing his next Attack to deal @ActiveDamage@ magic damage and restore @Effect1Amount@% missing Mana, increased to @Effect4Amount@% against champions.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Force Pulse
spells.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Force Pulse's Cooldown is reduced by @ReductionPerSpellCast@ second whenever any Ability is used near Kassadin.

Active: Kassadin unleashes a void pulse, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage and Slowing by @Effect2Amount@% for @Effect3Amount@ second.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Riftwalk
spells.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location, dealing @BaseDamage@ magic damage.

Each subsequent use of this Ability within the next @RStackDuration@ seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional @BonusDamage@ magic damage. The cost and damage increases can stack up to @MaxStacks@ times.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
